headline: Former Schwab Broker Suspended After Allegedly Making Illicit Profit-Sharing Agreement With Client
summary: Daniel Roper allegedly lost money while executing more than 20,000 trades in a little more than a year in an account he didn’t have discretion over.

raw.headline: Former Schwab Broker Suspended After Allegedly Making Illicit Profit-Sharing Agreement With Client

headline: Week’s Best: Why Isn’t Robinhood in the S&P 500?
summary: Robinhood Markets  has come a long way since its debut as a free stock trading app more than a decade ago, but it hasn’t been added to the S&P 500 index.  It has been passed over twice in July, even though it has a far larger market capitalization than recent additions,  The Trade Desk  and Block.  S&P makes decisions by committee and doesn’t reveal much about its process.

headline: Charles Schwab (SCHW) Declares Dividends & Announces US$20 Billion Share Buyback
summary: On July 24, 2025, The Charles Schwab Corporation (SCHW) declared dividends on common and preferred stocks and announced a $20 billion share repurchase plan, with its previous buyback program expiring the same day. The company's share price rose by 21% over the past quarter, a period marked by robust second-quarter earnings, where net income soared to $2,126 million from $1,332 million the previous year. While the broader market, including the S&P 500 and Nasdaq, hit new highs due to strong...

headline: Charles Schwab Corporation (SCHW) Price Target Increased at KBW As Q2 Results Impress
summary: The Charles Schwab Corporation (NYSE:SCHW) is one of the best 52-week high stocks to buy now. On July 21, Keefe, Bruyette & Woods reiterated an ‘Outperform’ rating on the stock and increased the price target to $102 from $108. The price target adjustment comes on the heels of Charles Schwab delivering better-than-expected second-quarter adjusted earnings […]
